short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the last message sent in fb messenger or instagram without marking it as read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every receive a message that you want to read, but you don't want the person who sent it to you to know you've read it? With this extension you can read the last message sent in any chat, without actually opening the chat. Simply navigate to you inbox on chrome (www.messenger.com for facebook messenger, www.instagram.com/direct/inbox/ for instagram), and hover you mouse over the link to the chat. Instead of a preview of the first few words, you'll be able to read the entire thing.
